title: Software Engineer Intern

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed and deployed Satellite Broadcast Manager (SBM), Receive Broadcast Manager (RBM), and Global Broadcast Service framework leveraging React, Maven, Docker, and GitLab CI/CD. title: Software Developer Co-op
description: Owned the end-to-end development of an Employee Portal for 150+ engineers and supervisors using Django, React and MSSQL. Implemented 5 fully integrated microservices and dashboards for on/offboarding using React and Django including uniform requests, vacation requests, inventory management, systems management, calendar integration, and notifications. Built a customizable form and template builder to enable digital transformation missions using React components to collect and perform data anaylsis. Optimized React codebase resulting in a 58% reduction in load time for dynamic web pages

title: Fontend Engineer Intern

title: Frontend Engineer Intern
